info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 4:04PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Beaverhead County through 445 PM MDT... At 404 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 18 miles northeast of Gibbonsville Idaho, to near Jackson Montana, to near Lemhi Idaho. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wisdom, Jackson and Polaris. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
